senses.sense_definition: An alternative form of <w>hehe</w>, representing a light, mischievous, or quiet laugh.

examples.text: She covered her mouth and let out a quiet <w>hihi</w> when she heard the secret.
I saw what you did there, <w>hihi</w>, and it was quite clever.

senses.sense_definition: A rare bird endemic to the North Island of New Zealand, also known as the <w>stitchbird</w>.

examples.text: Conservationists are working hard to protect the <w>hihi</w> population on the island sanctuary.
We were lucky enough to spot a male <w>hihi</w> with its distinctive yellow markings.
